item.title: Expert Session with Rafael FranÃ§a from Shopify
item.description: For this session, we will have Rafael as our expert guest. Rafael is a self-appointed Rails policeman, Rails Core Team Member, Principal Engineer. He works to define to future of Ruby and Rails at Shopify. See you in your inbox! ðŸ‘‹ What is Open Source Thursdays? Did you always want to contribute to Rails but can’t get past getting overwhelmed and scared when looking at a big project by yourself?
